name: ParasoftTestResultsQualityGate
description: Check Parasoft Test Results Quality Gate
author: Parasoft Corporation

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of test results to be evaluated for the threshold.

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.label: Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the actual total passed/executed tests number is equal to or less than this threshold, then a build is considered unstable or failed . If the actual total or newly failed tests number of test results is equal to or greater than this threshold, then a build is considered unstable or failed. Default value is 0.

validation.message: The value must be greater than or equal to 0

inputs.name: buildStatus
inputs.label: Build status if quality gate fails
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark the build as unstable or failed if the quality gate fails.

instanceNameFormat: Parasoft Test Results Quality Gate - $(type) tests - $(threshold)
